channel.title: Npc Above Head Chat
channel.description:
I know how to do this, it's just some code in npcHandler.java ... i did this ...
[code] case 2675: //intro man if (npcs[i].npcType == 2675){ //Intro man if (Misc.random2(3) <= 3) { //EX FOR TIMER: 20 npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Welcome to V1Pkz! Speak To Me!"); [/code]
it doesn't work tho?? idk what i've done wrong, if you can see it please help me :(

item.title: Npc Above Head Chat
item.dc:creator: @V113 V1
item.description:
@V113 wrote:

I know how to do this, it’s just some code in npcHandler.java … i did this …

case 2675: //intro man if (npcs[i].npcType == 2675){ //Intro man if (Misc.random2(3) <= 3) { //EX FOR TIMER: 20 npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Welcome to V1Pkz! Speak To Me!");

it doesn’t work tho?? idk what i’ve done wrong, if you can see it please help me
